mapper.select: select osms_favorite.id as favorite_id,osms_product.id as product_id,osms_product.name,min(price) as minprice,max(price) as maxprice,describ,url from osms_favorite join osms_product on osms_favorite.product_id=osms_product.id join osms_specification on osms_product.id=osms_specification.product_id join osms_image on osms_product.id=osms_image.product_id where osms_product.is_deleted <> 1 and user_id=#{user_id} group by osms_product.id
